E-Mail Messages
Date: Saturday, 6/15/1973
Subject: Progress of Glenn Abbott
Dear Sir,
Glenn Abbott has nothing more to prove at A Miami Orioles!
He has an ERA of 3.91 over there, so I think
a promotion wouldn't hurt.

Regards,
Scouting Director
